channel.title: [317]Very Good Bounty Hunter BASE [Delta]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Too see an updated tutorial my by friend Mod Dcrew Please go [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429814.0.html]Here!![/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429814.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429814.0.html[/url] [/size][/center]
[hr] Hello, I'm going to show you how to add a bounty hunter system to a 317 Delta Based Source!
[i][b]Description;[/b][/i]To show you how to add about 75% Bounty hunter to your server.
[i][b]Difficulty;[/b][/i] 4/10
[i][b]Classes Modified;[/b][/i] Client.class, ClickingMost.class
[i][b]Procedure;[/b][/i]
[hr]
[i][b]Step One;[/b][/i]
Open up Client.Class and declare this. [code=java] public boolean inBountyHunter() { if (absX >= 2967 && absX <= 2991 && absY >= 3605 && absY <= 3628) return true; else return false; }[/code] What this does is determines whether or not the player is in the bounty hunter region by using this line. [code]if (absX >= 2967 && absX <= 2991 && absY >= 3605 && absY <= 3628)[/code] So what does this line mean, Well i have simplified it for you. [code]if (absX >= SWXX && absX <= NEXX && absY >= SWYY && absY <= NEYY)[/code] SWXX is the most SouthWest X coordinate of the region NEXX is the most NorthEast X coordinate of the region SWYY is the most SouthWest Y coordinate of the region NEYY is the most Northeast Y coordinate of the region.
[hr]
[b][i]Step Two;[/i][/b]
Search for "MakeGlob" and add all of this. [code=java]//--start of bounty hunter--// makeGlobalObject(3217, 3221, 2804, 3, 10);//bounty hunter entrance makeGlobalObject(2978, 3606, 2609, 3, 10);//bounty hunter exit //--north wall--// makeGlobalObject(2966, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2967, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2968, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2969, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2970, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2971, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2972, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2973, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2974, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2975, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2976, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2977, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2978, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2979, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2980, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2981, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2982, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2983, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2984, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2985, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2986, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2987, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2988, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2989, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2990, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2991, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall //--east wall--// makeGlobalObject(2992, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3628, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3627, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3626, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3625, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3624, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3623, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3622, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3621, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3620, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3619, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3618, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3617, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3616, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3615, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3614, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3613, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3612, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3611, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3610, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3609, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3608, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3607, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3606, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3605, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2992, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall //--south wall--// makeGlobalObject(2991, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2990, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2989, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2988, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2987, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2986, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2985, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2984, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2983, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2982, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2981, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2980, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2979, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2978, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2977, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2976, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2975, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2974, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2973, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2972, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2971, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2970, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2969, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2968, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2967, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall //--west wall--// makeGlobalObject(2966, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3628, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3627, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3626, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3625, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3624, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3623, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3622, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3621, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3620, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3619, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3618, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3617, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3616, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3615, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3614, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3613, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3612, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3611, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3610, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3609, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3608, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3607, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3606, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3605, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall makeGlobalObject(2966, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall[/code]
What this does is create an entrance to get into the bounty hunter area at Lumbridge (you can change this by changing [code] makeGlobalObject(3217, 3221, 2804, 3, 10);//bounty hunter entrance[/code] too this [code] makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 2804, 3, 10);//bounty hunter entrance[/code] Just Change XXXX to the X Coordinate of where you want it and YYYY to the Y Coordinate.
[hr]
[i][b]Step Three;[/b][/i]
Search for "switch (objectID) {" and somewhere in that switch statement after a "break;" add this. [code=java] case 2804: triggerTele(2978, 3615, 0); sM("You enter the bounty Hunter Crater"); break;
case 2609: toX = 3222; toY = 3222; sM("You leave the bounty Hunter Crater"); break;[/code] All this does is add the actions to make ways into and out of the crater, seeing as we created the walls so no-one can get in our out once inside unless they use entrances or exits.
[hr]
[i][b]Step Four;[/b][/i]
Now search for "You Cannot Teleport" and after a } add this
[code=java] if (inBountyHunter()) { sM("You can't teleport out of the bounty hunter crater!"); return; }[/code] all this does is stop you from teleporting out of the crater.
[b]Ok Now you can save & Close Client.Class[/b]
[hr]
[i][b]Step Five;[/b][/i]
[b]Open ClickingMost.java[/b] and search for "Case 9154" This is your logout method. We're going to make it so you can't log out in the crater either! after [code=java] c.sM("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!"); break; } [/code]
add this:
[code=java] if (c.inBountyHunter()) { c.sM("You can`t log out while you are in Bounty Hunter"); break; }[/code] What this does is stop you from logging out whilst you are in the crater.
[b]Save and Close ClickingMost.java[/b]
[b]Compile and then run![/b]
[hr]
Congratulations you have just added Bounty hunter base.. Enjoy, I will be updating this tutorial soon
[i][b]Future Updates;[/b][/i]
[ul][li]Targets[/li] [li]Interface[/li] [li]Pickup Delay[/li][/ul]
[b][i]Picture;[/i][/b] [img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/2654/24096708.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Jc22493:

Why post an incomplete tutorial?

as i have already stated; i know people will find it useful as another PK spot. they don’t have to use it at bounty hunter.

I have also re-named the tutorial to a base of bounty hunter and removed the percentages, Everybody happy now?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Very Good Bounty Hunter BASE [Delta]

Why post an incomplete tutorial?

Because it makes idiots like me feel good?

item.title: [317]Very Good Bounty Hunter BASE [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I’ve only criticized your percentages. Not your work. I’ve got no problem with your work, you use conventions for the most part, which is more than I can say for half the people here. Just try to take a step back and think of how much you’ve actually added before assigning it a percentage. If you look at it, all it does is define that area, add an entrance and an exit, prevent you from teleporting, and prevent you from logging out. Its a good start but its nowhere near 75%. That’s the only point I was trying to make. I wish you the best of luck with the rest of your project and bounty hunter. I’m not going to criticize you further.

Jc22493:

Why post an incomplete tutorial?

My point exactly.

Read full topic

deathschaos9:

I know your not fond of my criticism, but why release bounty hunter that’s only 75% complete? And its not 75% BTW…Do you think adding this means your only missing 25% of bounty hunter?

Lets face it, i’m not fond of you at all… all you ever do is criticise my work and its not even constructive…

and i released it because i know people will find it useful as another PK spot. they don’t have to use it at bounty hunter…

So please. do run along…

item.title: [317]Very Good Bounty Hunter BASE [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Too see an updated tutorial my by friend Mod Dcrew Please go Here!!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429814.0.html
[/size][/center]

[hr]
Hello, I’m going to show you how to add a bounty hunter system to a 317 Delta Based Source!

Description;To show you how to add about 75% Bounty hunter to your server.

Difficulty; 4/10

Classes Modified; Client.class, ClickingMost.class

Procedure;

[hr]

Step One;

Open up Client.Class and declare this.

public boolean inBountyHunter() {
	if (absX >= 2967 && absX <= 2991 && absY >= 3605 && absY <= 3628)
	return true;
	else
	return false;
     }[/code]
What this does is determines whether or not the player is in the bounty hunter region by using this line. 
[code]if (absX >= 2967 && absX <= 2991 && absY >= 3605 && absY <= 3628)[/code]
So what does this line mean, Well i have simplified it for you.
[code]if (absX >= SWXX && absX <= NEXX && absY >= SWYY && absY <= NEYY)[/code]
SWXX is the most SouthWest X coordinate of the region
NEXX is the most NorthEast X coordinate of the region
SWYY is the most SouthWest Y coordinate of the region
NEYY is the most Northeast Y coordinate of the region.

[hr]

[b][i]Step Two;[/i][/b]

Search for "MakeGlob" and add all of this.
[code=java]//--start of bounty hunter--//
	       makeGlobalObject(3217, 3221, 2804, 3, 10);//bounty hunter entrance
	       makeGlobalObject(2978, 3606, 2609, 3, 10);//bounty hunter exit
//--north wall--//
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2967, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2968, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2969, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2970, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2971, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2972, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2973, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2974, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2975, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2976, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2977, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2978, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2979, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2980, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2981, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2982, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2983, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2984, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2985, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2986, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2987, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2988, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2989, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2990, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2991, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
//--east wall--//
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3628, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3627, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3626, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3625, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3624, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3623, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3622, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2992, 3621, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall

//--south wall--//
	       makeGlobalObject(2991, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall

	       makeGlobalObject(2974, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2973, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2972, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2971, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall

	       makeGlobalObject(2967, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
//--west wall--//
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3629, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3628, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3627, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3626, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3625, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3624, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3623, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3622, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3621, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3620, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3619, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3618, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3617, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3616, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3615, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3614, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3613, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3612, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3611, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3610, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3609, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3608, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3607, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3606, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3605, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall
	       makeGlobalObject(2966, 3604, 2493, 0, 10);//bounty hunter wall[/code]

What this does is create an entrance to get into the bounty hunter area at Lumbridge (you can change this by changing 
[code]	       makeGlobalObject(3217, 3221, 2804, 3, 10);//bounty hunter entrance[/code]
too this
[code]	       makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 2804, 3, 10);//bounty hunter entrance[/code]
Just Change XXXX to the X Coordinate of where you want it and YYYY to the Y Coordinate.

[hr]

[i][b]Step Three;[/b][/i]

Search for "switch (objectID) {"  and somewhere in that switch statement after a "break;" add this.
[code=java]	case 2804:
		triggerTele(2978, 3615, 0);
		sM("You enter the bounty Hunter Crater");
	break;

	case 2609:
		        toX = 3222;
			toY = 3222;
		sM("You leave the bounty Hunter Crater");
	break;[/code]
All this does is add the actions to make ways into and out of the crater, seeing as we created the walls so no-one can get in our out once inside unless they use entrances or exits.

[hr]

[i][b]Step Four;[/b][/i]

Now search for "You Cannot Teleport" and after a } add this

[code=java]                if (inBountyHunter()) {
                        sM("You can't teleport out of the bounty hunter crater!");
                        return;
                }[/code]
all this does is stop you from teleporting out of the crater.

[b]Ok Now you can save & Close Client.Class[/b]

[hr]

[i][b]Step Five;[/b][/i]

[b]Open ClickingMost.java[/b] and search for "Case 9154" This is your logout method. We're going to make it so you can't log out in the crater either!
after
[code=java]					c.sM("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!");
					break;
				}

add this:

if (c.inBountyHunter()) { c.sM("You can`t log out while you are in Bounty Hunter"); break; }
What this does is stop you from logging out whilst you are in the crater.

Save and Close ClickingMost.java

Compile and then run!

[hr]

Congratulations you have just added Bounty hunter base… Enjoy, I will be updating this tutorial soon
